text: My friends at SHL are hiring a Content Marketing Specialist <https://shl.wd3.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/SHL_Careers/job/Minneapolis-Office---Washington-Square-SHL/Content-Marketing-Specialist_JR001290>

attachments.title: Content Marketing Specialist
attachments.text: The Company: SHL helps companies optimize performance and productivity through deep people insights. Our market-leading people analytics and technology equip leaders and their teams to make confident, data-driven talent decisions that lead to stronger business outcomes. We anticipate, and help organizations solve, their most pressing talent challenges. Our science, innovation, rigor and commitment to proving business outcomes make us a trusted partner to organizations across the globe. SHL helps our customers win, and we need highly motivated people to join our dynamic global team. We’re driven by Strong Connections, Curiosity, Fearless Innovation, and Impact. More at <http://shl.com|shl.com>. We're looking for a passionate, entrepreneurial content marketer with exceptional writing, editing, creative and communication skills. You’ll tell stories that connect people with our brand, evangelize and build narratives around powerful data, bringing compelling content experiences to life across digital and experiential channels, and define metrics to track and enable the success of our marketing initiatives. This role reports into the Head of Americas Marketing and requires someone with strong project management skills, the ability to work in a fast-paced environment  with multiple internal stakeholders and partners and has a passion for developing marketing tactics that leverage both digital and non-digital channels to engage our target buyer personas. Key Responsibilities Help create the processes, guidelines, and quality standards needed to execute and scale the production of world-class campaigns. Work with internal stakeholders in product marketing and brand/PR to develop consistent messaging targeted towards key buyer personas in the Americas Produce original, compelling content across multimedia channels to implement in integrated marketing campaigns Craft and support email campaigns, conducting A/B tests and analyzing results to garner insights and optimize future campaigns Understand our core audiences, what motivates them, and how to leverage content to educate them on our capabilities   Required Skills/Experience Bachelor’s degree 5-7+ years in a content marketing or demand generation marketing role at a B2B company Strong written and verbal communication and problem-solving skills with high attention to detail Able to learn quickly based on edits, feedback, and direction. Ability to work on multiple projects at once and meet tight deadlines. Deep working knowledge of social best practices and proven experience sharing content across LinkedIn, Twitter and blogging platforms. Ability to quickly learn new technologies, products & systems In-depth experience using marketing tools such as Eloqua, Google Analytics Highly analytical and metrics driven. Results oriented with the ability to manage competing priorities   Desired Skills/Experience Proven history of translating technical concepts into understandable and accessible marketing content Strong attention to detail, ability to give and receive feedback, and strong desire to make an impact Self-motivated and able to work well both individually and in a highly collaborative environment Experience working with technical experts and product development teams to create compelling content Experience developing and executing content programs for social channels in a B2B environment HTML experience a plus What SHL Can Offer You: A culture comprised of diverse, global teams who have a passion for collaboration and client service. A comprehensive benefits package. Support, coaching, and on-the-job development to achieve career success. The ability to engage, influence, and impact a broad array of the world’s leading executives.
